question.en: [Question 1 - e.g., How does the free trial work?]

answer.en: [Answer to question 1 - be clear and helpful. Address common concerns and include relevant details like duration, features included, payment requirements, etc.]
answer.es: [Respuesta a pregunta 1 - sé claro y útil. Aborda preocupaciones comunes e incluye detalles relevantes como duración, características incluidas, requisitos de pago, etc.]

question.en: [Question 2 - e.g., Can I change my plan later?]

answer.en: [Answer to question 2 - explain the process and any important details about upgrading/downgrading, prorating, etc.]
answer.es: [Respuesta a pregunta 2 - explica el proceso y cualquier detalle importante sobre actualización/reducción, prorrateo, etc.]

question.en: [Question 3 - e.g., What payment methods do you accept?]

answer.en: [Answer to question 3 - list accepted payment methods and any relevant policies]
answer.es: [Respuesta a pregunta 3 - enumera métodos de pago aceptados y políticas relevantes]

answer.en: [Answer to question 4 - address security concerns with specific details about encryption, compliance, backups, etc.]
answer.es: [Respuesta a pregunta 4 - aborda preocupaciones de seguridad con detalles específicos sobre encriptación, cumplimiento, respaldos, etc.]

answer.en: [Answer to question 5 - clearly state your refund policy with timeframes and conditions]
answer.es: [Respuesta a pregunta 5 - establece claramente tu política de reembolso con plazos y condiciones]
